Text: Why 900p? You either keep it at the native 1080p, or resize to 720p. There's no good reason to invent a third option.
optimal (vs 1080p) for encoding(time, efficiency), storing, distribution. plus for Wide XGA, Wide XGA+, SXGA+, UXGA Đ¸ WSXGA+ , etc HD devices.
@reliant1 Optimal HOW? You're making it up for no good reason, and nobody is agreeing with you.
